Land Mine seen KiyKat and ran up.

"Time Bomb is hurt, I put him in a CR Tank." She said...
----- Original Message ----- 
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, August 26, 2000 6:03 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::KitKat:;
> 
> She looked at Megatron.  "I, I tried to save Etchingar, but he didn't 
> make it.  I tried to get more weapons from Phobia.  He gave me a 
> rifle and I returned as fast as I could to help you Commander 
> Megatron."  Se could tell things were going to get ugly, very quickly.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> >     Megatron and Waspinator retreat into the cave and slam the iron 
> clad door 
> > closed behinde them. Megatron was mad with Kitkat. It was her fault 
> this was 
> > going on. But, the bot must be an important bot if they want it so 
> bad.
> >     "Kitkat! What the hell do you think your doing?" He demanded, 
> ready to 
> > pummle her with his closed fist. His eyes were closed into little 
> angry 
> > crimsome slits.
> >     Waspinator ran to the control boad and began to initiate more 
> autoguns 
> > and re-routed power to the shields. He then turned to see if 
> Megatron was 
> > going to beat Kitkat.
> > 
> >     Aracnia oversaw the construction and was pleased. The shield 
> generator 
> > was up and functional, and already they had twelve double barrle 
> auto-guns. 
> > And with the forest around them, they had a great advantage.
> >     "Alright, Im going inside. Tarantulas you come too. I want to 
> find out 
> > who these aliens are and why they made this bunker." She said, 
> opening the 
> > hatch and getting ready to climb down.
> >     Tarantulas walked over, "Very well. I would like to investigate 
> this new 
> > technology myself."
> >     Thw two arachnids entered the bunker and climbed into the 
> darkness.
> 
> 
> 
>
